src:
FOTO: Perjalanan PSSI Era Edy Rahmayadi Hingga Iwan Budianto
01 Nov 2019, 21:34 by CNNIndonesia/ANTARA FOTO, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Perjalanan pengurus PSSI era Edy Rahmayadi yang penuh lika-liku hingga kini tampuk kepemimpinan jatuh ke tangan Iwan Budianto sebagai pelaksana tugas.


Edy Rahmayadi resmi terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI pada Kongres Pemilihan yang digelar di Hotel Mercure, Ancol, Jakarta Utara, 10 November 2016. (ANTARA FOTO/Wahyu Putro A)



Ketua Umum PSSI Edy Rahmayadi didampingi wakil ketua dijabat oleh Joko Driyono dan Iwan Budianto usai Kongres PSSI. (ANTARA FOTO/Wahyu Putro A)



PSSI resmi menunjuk Luis Milla sebagai pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-22 proyeksi SEA Games dan Asian Games 2018. Sementara Indra Sjafri menangani Timnas U-19 Indra Sjafri (kanan) dan Fakhri Husaini (kiri) memimpin Timnas U-16. (ANTARA FOTO/Akbar Nugroho Gumay)



Timnas Indonesia U-22 takluk 0-1 dari Malaysia pada semifinal SEA Games 2017 di Stadion Shah Alam, Selangor, pada 26 Agustus 2017. Kekalahan ini membuat Garuda Muda gagal lolos ke partai puncak. (AFP PHOTO/MOHD RASFAN)



Langkah Timnas Indonesia U-23 terhenti di babak 16 besar usai dikalahkan Uni Emirat Arab lewat drama adu penalti 3-4, pada 24 Agustus 2018. (CNNIndonesia/Adhi Wicaksono)



Edy Rahmayadi resmi mundur dari jabatan Ketua Umum PSSI pada Kongres PSSI di Hotel Sofitel, Bali, 20 Januari 2019. Joko Driyono ditunjuk sebagai Pelaksana Tugas Ketua Umum PSSI. (ANTARA FOTO/Nyoman Budhiana)



Plt Tugas Ketua Umum PSSI Joko Driyono divonis bersalah atas kasus perusakan barang bukti dugaan pengaturan skor. (CNN Indonesia/Andry Novelino)



Plt Ketua Umum PSSI Iwan Budianto (keempat kiri) didampingi Sekjen Ratu Tisha Destria (kelima kiri) dan sejumlah anggota Exco berfoto bersama usai kongres luar biasa (KLB) PSSI di Jakarta, Sabtu (27/7/2019). (ANTARA FOTO/Akbar Nugroho Gumay/hp.)
text:
PHOTO: PSSI Journey Era Edy Rahmayadi Until Iwan Budianto
01 Nov 2019, 21:34 by CNNIndonesia / BETWEEN PHOTOS, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Edy Rahmayadi's PSSI management trip which is full of twists and turns until now the leadership falls into the hands of Iwan Budianto as the executor of the task.


Edy Rahmayadi was officially elected as Chairman of PSSI at the Election Congress held at the Mercure Hotel, Ancol, North Jakarta, November 10, 2016. (ANTARA PHOTO / Wahyu Putro A)



PSSI Chairperson Edy Rahmayadi was accompanied by a deputy chairman held by Joko Driyono and Iwan Budianto after the PSSI Congress. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Wahyu Putro A)



PSSI officially appointed Luis Milla as the coach of the Indonesia U-22 national team in the 2018 SEA Games and Asian Games projections. While Indra Sjafri handled the U-19 national team Indra Sjafri (right) and Fakhri Husaini (left) led the U-16 national team. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Akbar Nugroho Gumay)



Indonesia U-22 national team 0-1 defeat of Malaysia in the 2017 SEA Games semifinal at the Shah Alam Stadium, Selangor, on August 26, 2017. This defeat made the Young Garuda failed to qualify for the top party. (AFP PHOTO / MOHD RASFAN)



Step U-23 Indonesian national team stopped in the last 16 after being defeated by the United Arab Emirates through a 3-4 shootout drama, on August 24, 2018. (CNNIndonesia / Adhi Wicaksono)



Edy Rahmayadi officially resigned from the position of Chairperson of PSSI at the PSSI Congress at the Hotel Sofitel, Bali, January 20, 2019. Joko Driyono was appointed as Acting Chairperson of PSSI's General Chair. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Nyoman Budhiana)



Acting Chairperson of PSSI Chairman Joko Driyono was found guilty of damaging evidence of alleged score fixing. (CNN Indonesia / Andry Novelino)



Acting Chairperson of PSSI Iwan Budianto (fourth left) accompanied by Secretary General Ratu Tisha Destria (fifth left) and a number of Exco members took a group photo after the PSSI extraordinary congress (KLB) in Jakarta, Saturday (07/27/2019). (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Akbar Nugroho Gumay / cellphone.)
